job_tasks.phrase: As a Full Stack Developer, you will be responsible for the innovation and development of our cutting-edge Digital Assistant.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the core responsibility of developing a digital product, which falls under traditional software development.

job_tasks.phrase: Our team is dedicated to creating conversational experiences through web/app and voice channels based on the latest conversational technology within the KPN ecosystem.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the development of user-facing experiences and integration within an existing ecosystem, which is a software development task.

job_tasks.phrase: As a Full Stack Developer, you will work with a team of experts to develop and maintain: The conversational engine, a Python (Asyncio) backend that handles the connection with the digital assistant platform and for routing live chats and callbacks.
job_tasks.justification: This details the development and maintenance of a backend service using Python, a core software engineering activity.

job_tasks.phrase: You will also be responsible for developing a React/Redux based front-end chat UI that communicates with the conversational engine, which lives on our website (kpn.com) and the mijnkpn apps.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the development of a front-end user interface using React/Redux, a standard software development task.

job_tasks.phrase: Additionally, you will work on a FastAPI based BFF that provides endpoints for the conversational platform to enrich the conversation with customer, product information and integration for specific use cases.
job_tasks.justification: This involves developing a backend-for-frontend (BFF) using FastAPI, which is a software integration and development task.

job_tasks.phrase: In addition to these tracks, you will also assist our sister teams with generating technical components within the conversational platform that they can use within their conversational content.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the creation of reusable technical components for a platform, which is a software development and integration task.

job_tasks.phrase: Our current focus is on adding integrations with KPN systems to improve the digital self-service capabilities of the digital assistant, strengthening the pivotal bridge function to our customer service department with new channels, and making the digital assistant voice-enabled.
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the integration of the assistant with existing systems and adding new functionalities like voice enablement, which are software development tasks.

job_tasks.phrase: And last but not least integration of exciting generative AI capabilities into our digital assistant.
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly mentions integrating generative AI capabilities, which is a software integration task, albeit with an AI component.

job_tasks.phrase: As a Full Stack Developer at KPN, you will play a leading role in shaping the direction of our technical development.
job_tasks.justification: This describes a role in technical development and decision-making, which is part of software engineering leadership.

job_tasks.phrase: You will be encouraged to make architectural decisions and convince others of your views.
job_tasks.justification: Making architectural decisions is a key software engineering responsibility.

job_tasks.phrase: Our passionate team focuses on continuously optimizing quality and speed through automation.
job_tasks.justification: Optimizing quality and speed through automation is a core principle of modern software development practices.

soft_skills.phrase: As a Full Stack Developer at KPN, you will play a leading role in shaping the direction of our technical development.
soft_skills.justification: Playing a leading role in shaping technical direction implies innovation and ownership of the technical vision.

soft_skills.phrase: You will be encouraged to make architectural decisions and convince others of your views.
soft_skills.justification: Making architectural decisions and advocating for them demonstrates ownership and a drive for innovation in technical solutions.

soft_skills.phrase: You will be encouraged to make architectural decisions and convince others of your views.
soft_skills.justification: Convincing others of views is a direct communication and collaboration skill.

soft_skills.phrase: Our passionate team focuses on continuously optimizing quality and speed through automation.
soft_skills.justification: Continuously optimizing through automation implies a mindset of learning and adapting to improve processes and outcomes.

profile.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes traditional full-stack development tasks, including building backend services (Python, FastAPI), front-end UIs (React/Redux), and integrating various components. While it mentions 'generative AI capabilities' and 'conversational technology', the core responsibilities and the majority of the tasks described fall under 'Software Development & Integration' (Macro-Category A). The role is about building and maintaining a digital assistant that *uses* AI, rather than focusing on the AI model development or specialization itself. Therefore, it fits the profile of an AI-Adjacent Software Engineer.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is very clear about the responsibilities and technologies involved. It explicitly states 'Full Stack Developer' and details the front-end and back-end components. The mention of AI is in the context of integration into an existing product, aligning well with the AI-Adjacent Software Engineer profile. The language is unambiguous.
